notes: The design is inspired by Scandinavian minimalism with clean lines and natural materials.
Local building norms have been considered, ensuring compliance with structural codes for a G+2 studio apartment townhouse in India.
Vastu principles are incorporated: the kitchen is placed towards the North; living areas face south-west or north-east to invite positive energy.
The corner plot design utilizes the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation, enhancing the overall ambience.
A two-car garage has been integrated on the ground floor with easy access from the main entrance.
The rooftop terrace is planned above the living areas and dining space, providing an open-air relaxation zone.
